thread.title: U.S. stocks open lower after GDP report
thread.title_full: U.S. stocks open lower after GDP report - MarketWatch

author: By     Anora Mahmudova
title: U.S. stocks open lower after GDP report
text:
U.S. stocks opened slightly lower Thursday after a government report showed the economy picked up pace in the second quarter, putting the Federal Reserve on track to raise interest rates as soon as September. The S&P 500 SPX, -0.29% opened 3 points, or 0.2%, lower at 2,104. The Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, -0.26% dropped 21 points, or 0.1%, to 17,733. The Nasdaq Composite COMP, -0.24% began the session down 10 points, or 0.2%, at 5,102.
Read the full story: U.S. stocks fall as GDP data leave Fed on track to hike
